analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BablosCrowdsaleWallet.withdrawPayments (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#426-450):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.allowance(payee,address(this)) >= tokenBalances[payee]) (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#439-441)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenBalances (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#447-448)
	- weiBalances (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#447)
totalAmount in BablosCrowdsaleWallet._totalInvestedNonEther (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#325-326) is a local variable never initialiazed

BablosCrowdsaleWallet.withdrawTokens (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#420-426) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,_value) (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#425-426)

BablosCrowdsaleWallet.withdrawPayments (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#426-450) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(payee,address(this),tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#448-449)

BablosCrowdsaleWallet.unholdTeamTokens (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#454-459) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,teamShares) (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol)
	-token.approve(owner,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol)

Reentrancy in BablosCrowdsaleWallet.withdrawPayments (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#426-450):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.allowance(payee,address(this)) >= tokenBalances[payee]) (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#439-441)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalInvested (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#441-446)

BablosTokenInterface.frozen should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#181)
PriceUpdaterInterface.decimalPrecision should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#192-193)
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#90-94) should be declared external
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#98-103) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#150-151) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#151-154) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#155-156) should be declared external
ERC20.allowance (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#163-165) should be declared external
ERC20.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#165-169) should be declared external
ERC20.approve (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#170-175) should be declared external
BablosTokenInterface.burn (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#181-183) should be declared external
BablosTokenInterface.setSale (/unique_contracts/0x30f1ec36200e9e9aeb0a5b9cc696215e25bea0fc.sol#183-185) should be declared external
